ygData.subject: RE: Level of Gravity Flux
ygData.msgSnippet: We do get it, and it is level 44... Zebbi D Arcanus (49th E Ci) ... From: Lomack [mailto:lomack@mindspring.com] Sent: Monday, January 10, 2000 11:56 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
We do get it, and it is level 44...
Zebbi D'Arcanus (49th E'Ci)

-----Original Message-----
From: Lomack [mailto:lomack@...]
Sent: Monday, January 10, 2000 11:56 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Level of Gravity Flux


From: Lomack <lomack@...>

ok I now I am confused.
I don't know if a change was made over the past month because I haven't
been in game in a while due to the holidays. However, today I was parusing
some of the web sites and noticed the following about the spell Gravity Flux

EQ Lizer: http://gameznet.com/eq/spells/wizard.html
Doesen't even list the spell for wizards at any level

Casters Realm: http://eq.castersrealm.com/spells/wizard/
Lists Gravity Flux as a level 49 wizard spell.

Graffe's Wizard Compalation: http://www.graffe.com/
Lists Gravity Flux as a 44th level wizard spell.

I assume that EQ lizer just isn't up to date and that we do actually get
the spell. However I am not unsure weather or not its a level 44 wizard
spell or a level 49 wizard spell....
Can someone confirm?


Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
